channel.title: Funs on Ashley D. Greeley
channel.description: Recent content in Funs on Ashley D. Greeley

item.title: Goddard on the Green
item.description: On June 13, 2023, Goddard had a fun event called Goddard on the Green. The Goddard theater group, MAD (Music And Drama), was invite to perform a few songs. I sang “I’m not afraid of anything” from Songs from a New World and “Part of Your World” from the Little Mermaid. It was fun to sing for an audience! See below for YouTube links. I’m not Afraid of Anything Part of Your World
